info.title: Constant Contact
info.description: Make Constant Contact's leading email and event marketing services accessible directly from your app.

get.description: Search for contacts on a specific list that have been updated since a specified date.

parameters.name: updatedsince
parameters.description: Specified date. The date has to be in UTC in the format specified by the Atom spec (i.e. 2008-07-23T14:21:06.407Z).

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The account owner's Constant Contact user name. Value must be in lower case.

200.description: Make Constant Contact's leading email and event marketing services accessible directly from your app.
